column4: Can somebody please help me with Xserver? Im getting a mouse error causing the GUI to fail to start
um, i think so...I got my ubuntu cd's from the shipit free program
im running window right now because ubuntu still wont boot the GUI
windows*
my mouse is still operational in windows even though i removed the ps/2 connection
which version of ubuntu did you install?

that url should get you past that - you can install a text irc client like sirc to connect to /server irc.freenode.net do the whole identify thing and join us here from ubuntu with the command 'sudo apt-get install sirc'
well you could but it would be easier if you went there now and printed out the details :)
ask the question in the channel because some may be able to answer and some may not and without your question people do not know what it is you want
that sudo line was for you :)
try it after you make changes and after you do other stuff - it was suggested to you to choose vesa as a short term card type :)
have you done anything with the machine yet? you have been at it a good few hours now
that is true, but i havent been able to get a GUI up yet
so the answer is nothing other than faffing about with a few apt-get lines
it was suggested to you eariler to choose vesa first to get some kind of working system, did you do that, Bob2 is rather clueful
and has the same card as you
yes, but i was still having trouble so i changed it again...
did you get my PM?
I think you know I did :)
grrrr reinstall -^_^-
i have a problem with xserver if i try the live version too
you ask for an opinion, I gave you mine, that is all I have
